hackathon-description-text: HackTX is a place to grow. Challenge yourself to learn something, break something, or create something.
hackathon-rules: Please visit hacktx.com for more info
hackathon-description-header: HackTX is a place to grow. Challenge yourself to learn something, break something, or create something.

hackathon-prizes.prize-content: Dell 4K monitors
Snapchat Spectacles and Oculus DK2s
Google Homes and Dell tablets
$250 Amazon gift cards to each member of the winning team

Facebook will sponsor a Community Building Award to the team whose hack helps build community and bring the world closer together. The winning team will be awarded an all expense paid trip to compete at Facebook's Global Hackathon.
Prize: $100 Amazon gift card (per person on the team)

We challenge you to help people get a better understanding of their financial lives through any interface you choose - you can create insights by mixing APIs, provide recommendations of better budgeting, or anything else related to personal finance. You can qualify for our prize in two ways:
hackathon-prizes.prize-title: Generate Consumer Insights Using Citi APIs (Citi FinTech)

hackathon-prizes.prize-content: 1st place: Samsung Gear VR 2nd place: Raspberry Pi
+ Bonus Points for Digital Currency! Prize: HBK branded beats by Dre Cans
hackathon-prizes.prize-title: Best Hack Involving a Financial Transaction (HBK Capital Management)

hackathon-prizes.prize-content: Best Use of Social Media Data for Disaster Response
hackathon-prizes.prize-title: Social Good Challenge (JP Morgan Chase & Co)

hackathon-prizes.prize-content: To get your free .tech domain name:
hackathon-prizes.prize-title: Best project with a .tech domain name (.TECH)

hackathon-prizes.prize-content: For the past 70+ years, gas stations have remained pretty much the same. You take your vehicle, drive to a gas station, and fill it up. It’s time this changes.
Prize: AirPods or Pixel Buds, or $150 visa gift card + invitation to participate in AWS Activate program (up to $100,000 in AWS credit) for every member of the team
Leverage Microsoft Azure, Cognitive Services API, Windows10, Bing, Kinect, or HoloLens & have an opportunity to win a Surface device (up to 4 per team).
Prize: Losei Dual Wireless Earbuds V4.1
Bring us closer to your favorite sci-fi technology! You don't need to build it but bring us as close to it as you can. You can use any technology you want.
hackathon-prizes.prize-title: Bring Your Favorite Sci-Fi Technology to Life (BlueChasm)

hackathon-prizes.prize-content: Prize: $100 Amazon gift card to each team member (up to 4 people)
Whichever team uses MongoDB the best will get a $50 amazon gift card for each member of the team.
To be eligible for this prize, the majority of your team members must be first time hackathon goers (HackTX is their first hackathon ever)
$250 Amazon Web Services Credit
hackathon-prizes.prize-title: Amazon Web Services - Best Use of AWS

hackathon-prizes.prize-content: Raspberry Pi & PiHut Essential Kit

In the world of Single Sign On, there are many issues. For example, how do you protect against credential theft while still allowing someone to login to their account securely? We want you to find an innovative way to implement SSO for a better, smoother, more secure experience for users.
The winner of the MSVH will have to opportunity to sit down with Eric Tarczynski, Contrary’s general
